text:
Our platform
accelerates the plan, build, operate,

lifecycle for telecom companies,
for smart cities, for private networks.

And the process of deploying
infrastructure is very complex.

It's very fragmented, it has multiple
different stakeholders involved.

So as the velocity of infrastructure
deployment increases over the next decade,

companies need better,
more robust, scalable, secure solutions

to deploy infrastructure
better, faster, cheaper.
We provide a simple no-code SaaS platform

leveraging the AWS cloud capabilities
to help customers achieve those goals.

We are working with an innovative,
renewable and solar grid provider in Latin

America called Hybrico,
and they leverage our platform

to manage their deployments
and operations.

And we’re
working with tower companies in Asia.

We’re working with mobile operators
in the Middle East.

Our focus with AWS over
the next year is to increase
the reach of the platform so more

customers can leverage the benefits
provided by FieldForce

in accelerating
infrastructure deployment and operations.
